body.p: A special case are letters that have been written over several days and therefore contain several dates within the letter text. In this case, the <dateline> element can be set outside of <opener> or <closer> and can also be used within the letter text:
body.codeblock:
[title of the letter] [salutation] [date]

[text of the letter]

[date]

[text of the letter]

[final salutation]
